body.name: Wireless Earbud, Bluetooth Headphones 5.3 NEW 40H Ear Buds Bass Stereo Earphones Noise Cancelling Earbud with 4 ENC Mic, in-Ear Bluetooth Earbud USB-C LED Display IP7 Waterproof Sport for Android iOS
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 13 hrs 24 mins
features: Leading Bluetooth V5.3 Technology and One-Step Auto Pairing: Adopting advanced Bluetooth 5.3, wireless earbud support HSP HFP A2DP AVRCP, which offer you an unparalleled audio experience with faster transmission speed, stronger connection stability, and longer range of bluetooth. Taken from the charging case, bluetooth headphones will be paired with each other automatically, and just hitting on bluetooth list i13 on your device to connect. In a matter of seconds, you are in euphonic music world.

Dual LED Power Display and Upgraded 40H Playback: Dual LED power display on the case can help check the charging status of wireless headphones and charging case. Earbud wireless bluetooth can get 8 hours play back from a single charge. Lightweight charging case supports 4 times of recharging for wireless earphones, gives up to 40 hours continuous music time. The Type-C charging port can provide faster and safer charging. Take it to travel with you, you can enjoy long-lasting music every day.

Stereo Deep Bass and Clear Call: Wireless earphones adopt with DSR lossless HD rendering technology and equip with premium 13mm dynamic driver-the drive area is 4 times than the normal drive area, making the bass punchier and midrange full and textured, treble crystal crisp. Large chamber acoustic design well balances the internal and external air pressure to avoid sound loss, bluetooth earphones are combined ENC noise cancelling mic ensuring you can be heard clearly even in noisy environment.

Ultralight and Comfort Fit: The pocket-sized charging case does not take up any space to carry, and you will not have any stress on wearing Sports earbud. Earbud wireless headphones are designed to fit the contours of the human ear with a curved structure that is same to the shape of the ear canal, making them comfortable to wear and not falling out when running, gym. Headphones bluetooth use IP7 nano-coating technology, which can protect internal components from liquids and ensure a longer life

Smart Touch Control and Wide Compatibility: Features with touch control sensors, headphones wireless bluetooth allows you to conveniently power on/off, play/pause, skip songs, answer/hang up, adjust volume, activate Siri and access other functions at the touch of a button. Free your hands completely when you’re busy doing exercise, driving or running. Wireless bluetooth headphones are Compatible with most Bluetooth-enabled devices including ios or Android smartphones, TV, computer, Laptop etc,.
body.description: ★Bluetooth V5.3 Wireless EarphonesAdvanced Bluetooth 5.3 technology provides stable connection and high-speed transmission with lower power consumption, ensuring strong and long distance range. The range is up to 15 meters away. Never worry about cutting off during listening and controlling. These mini wireless headphones are compatible with most Bluetooth-enabled devices.★Active Noise Reduction, Achieve Clear Callsi13 2024 wireless earbud bluetooth with bio-carbon fiber composite diaphragm and polymer TPU of 13mm large dynamic unit, powerful low frequency, delicate and unique mid-high frequency, to create a beautiful sound quality. Accurately capture your voice in real-time, ideal for calls, face time, online meetings.★IP7 Waterproof ProtectionSport headphones are made of high quality waterproof materials, certificated with IP7 waterproof rating, professionally protects the internal structure of waterproof earbud from the erosion of water and sweat. You can bring them anywhere you go under all kinds of outdoor environment. Perfect for running, jogging, hiking, yoga, exercises, gym, fitness, traveling and etc.★Ultra-lightweight and Comfortable DesignWe tested the sport bluetooth headphones with over 2000 unique human ears to create an ergonomic design. Whether you' re running or sports, the sport wireless earbud will stay in ear securely.★USB-C Charging Case and LED Power DisplayCompact and lightweight magnetic charging case exclusively for you to carry wireless headset around. Wireless bluetooth headphones USB-C charging case with led power Display shows remaining power in percentage.★Easy Touch ControlOne touch area control all aspects of the bluetooth headphones, more convenient than other button control wireless headphones. Play, pause, skip song, pick up call, volume control and activate Siri or Google Assistant all done by its smart touch sensors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these Bluetooth earbuds and am totally satisfied with both the quality and performance. Here are a few reasons why:Sound Quality: The audio quality is outstanding. The bass is deep, and the treble is crisp, making them great for both voice and music.Comfort and Fit: The earbuds are very comfortable to wear and do not fall out during moderate activity.Battery Life: The battery life is excellent and the charging case is great when you don't have access to a charger.Connectivity: Pairing the earbuds with my devices is very easy. They automatically turn on when removed from the charging case. I have connected to my android phone, smart TV, and Kindle Fire Max (which does not have an earphone jack).Touch Controls: The instructions for the touch controls on the earbuds are accurate and easy. Voice assistants announce when the earbuds are turned on/off and when they are paired. You can also play/pause music and adjust the volume.Noise Isolation: These earbuds do a great job of blocking out external noise. I could barely hear my table saw when I turned it on while listening to music. I can't wait until spring and summer when rototill the garden and cut my grass.Price: This product is a great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These paired with my devices easily, are super comfy to wear, and the sound is excellent. Battery life is also solid. Very happy with my purchase, especially at the price point!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Earbuds! Great Price!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these Barbuda for about 2 months now, and they really are good! Great bass, long play time, easy charge, comfortable and very sleek looking. I use them to workout and they have been an awesome asset since my last earbuds broke. Very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got these because they were cheaper and had great reviews. I got them and they have great sound and they feel very nice in the ear. They connect right up with no issues I would recommend these for anyone for value and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Insane bass. Great sound quality. Lightweight. Spacial audio.
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many expensive earphones and none come close in regards to bass. These have 13 mm drivers, by far the largest drivers I’ve found in earbuds. The bass is soooo good. Main reason why I bought it. I also got these for just $25 during a sale ($70 normally) so insane bang for buck.The battery life is actually insane for its price. The buds themselves pair instantly and stay in, sometimes I forget they are in due to how lightweight and comfortable they are. I see why they have such high ratings.If you want some premium sounding earbuds with heavy emphasis on bass (but not the kinds that makes your head hurt), then these are easily the best. I’ve tried so many earbuds from low price to expensive and these are easily the best. You will not regret it. Usually the are on sale from $25-35 so buy them when you can!Apparently it advertised noise cancellation (which I don’t care about, I actually rather would like to hear a little in case someone needs my attention) but they definitely don’t cancel out all noise. They don’t cancel loud noises, but I prefer that. I want to be able to hear if someone is yelling my name in case of emergency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sound, but no app management
reviews.reviewText: Like: Easy to use, audio quality is great, I really like the battery strength.Cons: the bevel of ear bud prevents a deep ear canal insertion. This design prevents a good seat with sweaty or waxy ear canal. But I can live with that.The bigger issue is not having an app to disable features like the touch function because you have to keep reinserting the Buds. I dropped 3 important calls because of pressing a certain spot and the programming disconnects the call.There's no integration with Android wearable as a worst case. I won't return them because the price is so cheap and they give you nearly 60% of big brand features, but unfortunately I cannot accept these as my default Buds, and I will be picking up a big brand Beats or return to Samsung Buds Pro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These ear buds came looking exactly like the pictures shown! Actually the pictures didn't even do them justice! My daughter is in love with them they are so nice and even have a digital display on the front of the case for battery charge and what not. They are quality and that's not even the best part!!!!! The sound is amazing 👏 they are extremely loud and very clear with amazing bass for ear buds I definitely was very impressed and to top it off they are very affordable . I would definitely buy them again for friends and for myself. You guys did a great job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Easy to Use, and Clear
reviews.reviewText: Great earbuds, especially for the price. It's easy to connect to my devices, fits well, and has good sound quality. I'll probably buy an extra pair.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ecouteur avec un bon rapport qualité prix
reviews.reviewText: Agréablement surpris pas ces écouteurs, les materiaux utilisés sont de bonnes qualités.La batterie des écouteurs tient bien la charge, et le boitié a une bonne capacité de recharge, ce qui permet d’avoir des écouteurs fonctionnels toutes la journée.Au niveau de la qualité du son, le son produit par les écouteurs est trés correct. Et il permettent une bonne isolation avec les bruits exterieurs grâce au systeme de reduction de bruit actif. il m’est arrivé plusieurs fois qu’on me parle et que je ne m’en rends pas alors que le son de ma musique n’etait pas fort du tout.Les fonctionnalités permisent par les boutons tactiles sont réactive et trés sympa. Il est possible de monter, baisser le son, changer de musique (avant & arrière) mettre play/pause. Il est aussi possible de deccrocher / raccrocher en cas d’appel.Autre point important, je trouve que le maintient des écouteurs dans l’oreille ce fait super bien, je n’ai pas fait de sport avec, mais j’ai eu l’occasion de marcher, cuisiner, bricoler ... et les écouteurs restent bien en place et ne m’ont pas causé de douleur aux oreilles.De plus je n’ai eu aucune difficulté de connexion en utilisant les écouteurs. Une fois la connexion établie, dès que l’on sort les écouteurs de leurs boitié, la connexion se fait trés rapidement au dernier appareil connecté. Et je n’ai jamais eu de perte de signal / connexion bluetooth.Je recommande ces écouteurs !

reviews.reviewTitle: Esperienza Eccezionale con le Cuffie Bluetooth 5.3 Oro Rosa
reviews.reviewText: Ho recentemente acquistato le Cuffie Bluetooth 5.3 Oro Rosa e sono rimasto estremamente soddisfatto dell'esperienza complessiva. Questo prodotto offre una combinazione perfetta di funzionalità avanzate e design elegante.La qualità audio è eccezionale, offrendo un suono stereo HiFi cristallino che permette di immergersi completamente nella propria musica preferita. La tecnologia Bluetooth 5.3 assicura una connessione stabile e una copertura affidabile, senza interruzioni fastidiose.Le quattro microfoni con tecnologia ENC (Environmental Noise Cancellation) garantiscono chiamate chiare e nitide, anche in ambienti rumorosi. Ho apprezzato particolarmente la cancellazione del rumore, che crea un'esperienza d'ascolto immersiva.La resistenza all'acqua IP7 è un grande vantaggio, consentendo un utilizzo senza preoccupazioni durante l'allenamento o in giornate piovose. La durata della batteria è notevole, garantendo lunghe sessioni di ascolto senza dover ricaricare frequentemente.Il design elegante delle cuffie, con il tocco di oro rosa, le rende non solo funzionali ma anche alla moda. Le luci LED aggiungono un tocco di stile e sono un dettaglio piacevole durante l'utilizzo.In conclusione, le Cuffie Bluetooth 5.3 Oro Rosa sono un acquisto eccellente per chi cerca prestazioni audio di alta qualità, funzionalità avanzate e un design accattivante. Consiglio vivamente queste cuffie a chiunque cerchi un'esperienza senza fili completa e appagante.

Auricolari di buona fattura, semplici da abbinare al telefono, buona connessione anche a distanza, qualità del suono e dell'isolamento dal rumore esterno ottimi, le indosso anche asciugando i capelli e a volume alto non sento nemmeno il rumore del phon. Comandi touch direttamente sulla cuffietta, comodissimi e super sensibili, buon audio anche del microfono. La case ha l'indicatore di carica della batteria, molto utile. Batteria di buona durata.Consegnate con 3 gommini adattatori per l'orecchio e io che fatico a trovare una cuffietta adatta ho finalmente risolto. Li consiglio! Qualità prezzo super!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent Sound, brilliant bass & quality made product & comfy
reviews.reviewText: Wireless Earbuds, Wireless Headphones Bluetooth 5.3 Headphones with 4 ENC Mic, NEW 40H Bluetooth Earphones in Ear Deep Bass Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Earbuds Mini Ear Buds IP7 Waterproof LED Display are fantastic quality and at such great value, I definitely recommend. I’ve bought a set for my wife too and she loves them and she usually prefers over ear headphones. These provide a great sound quality and the surround sound works well too. The case is small and handy to put in a pocket very versatile and easy to charge. They last a long time depending on your use. They look sleek and fit our ears comfortably, you forget that you have them in they are so comfy and neat and small. We love them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ordtop Bluethooth Earbuds .... eine wirkliche positive Überraschung
reviews.reviewText: Ich habe diese Earbuds gekauft weil ich für den Sport neue gebraucht habe, da bei den Alten die Ladestation defekt war.Anforderungen an die neuen In-Ears waren:-Sound mit einem guten Bass -guter Halt im Ohr bei stärkerer Bewegung -Preis unter 50,00 €Ablauf des KaufesDie Earbuds wurden sehr schnell geliefert. Verpackt waren sie in einem überraschenderweise wertig aussehenden Karton. Die Ladeeinheit hat ein schönes, schlichtes Design.Bedienung und KlangKopplung geht schnell und unproblematisch. Ladefunktion bietet schnelle Ladezeiten und lange Standzeiten der Station. Sehr gute Benutzungsdauer der Buds.Die Buds halten sehr gut im Ohr und tragen sich angenehm. Es gibt auch noch 2 Silikon Ersatzaufsätze dazu.Allerdings ist für mich Grobmotoriker die Bedienung der Touchtasten zu fein. Ich komme immer mal wieder daran und verstelle etwas z.B. die Lautstärke. Dies ist aber mein Fehler und nicht den Buds anzukreiden. Ansonsten sind die Funktionen aber, gemäß der Anleitung, einwandfrei gegeben.Der Klang hat für mich gerade den richtigen Bass, welcher von manchem Rezensenten bemängelt wird. Dies ist aber, denke ich, ein subjektives Empfinden. Ich habe sie gekauft weil ausdrücklich mit einem tiefen Bass beworben. Die einstellbare Lautstärke ist für mich ausreichend. Habe es halt, entgegen aller Warnungen hinsichtlich des Schwellenwertes, gerne ein bisschen laut. Beispielsweise klingt "Neunzig" von Apache gerade richtig, um mal eine Referenz zu nennen.Selbstverständlich sind die Buds kein audiophiles Referenzteil, aber zum Preis von 22,98 € ,die ich bezahlt habe, absolut ihr Geld wert. Selbst wenn sie nur eine gewisse Lebensdauer haben, ist ein Ersatz finanziell verkraftbar.Einzig die mögliche Reichweite kann ich nicht bestätigen, diese liegt bei mir bei maximal 10 Metern.RésuméKlare Kaufempfehlung und 5 Sterne von mir.
